article_title: Supreme Court Rules Obama’s Recess Appointments Violated the Constitution
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: The Supreme Court ruled 9-0 that Obama’s “recess appointments” to the National Labor Relations Board violated the Constitution in NLRB v. Noel Canning.

og.description: The Supreme Court ruled 9-0 that Obama’s “recess appointments” to the National Labor Relations Board violated the Constitution in NLRB v. Noel Canning.
